name: Dino Memory Boost！
effect: [Main] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, place this card in your battle area.  [Main] ＜Delay＞ (Trash this card in your battle area to activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.) ・Gain 2 memory.
security_effect: [Security] Place this card in its owner's battle area.
